unnormalised: Arre yaar, maka Myntra thavn ek saree ghetli ani UPI payment don fauti fail zale! Don hazar rupya ashech vyarth gele. Shevttak maka maza credit card vapraunk poddlo. Aasha asa ki te lavkar rupya patthavtele, naatar customer care kade dukhar korcho poddtolo. Konnakui online paymentanchi problem yetat kai aaje kal? Hem mhanje dar transactionak kain tori takrar asta.
normalised: Arre yaar, mhaka Myntra thavn ek saree ghetli ani U-P-I payment don fautti fail zale! Don hazar rupaye asach nuxkan zale. Xevttak mhaka mhojem credit card vapronk poddlem. As mhon refund zalech, nhoi zalear customer care-ak contact korcho poddtolo. Konnakui aaz kal online payments-ant problem zata? Darek transaction-ant kitem tori prob asta.
text: Arre yaar, maka Myntra thavn ek saree ghetli ani UPI payment don fauti fail zale! Don hazar rupya ashech vyarth gele. Shevttak maka maza credit card vapraunk poddlo. Aasha asa ki te lavkar rupya patthavtele, naatar customer care kade dukhar korcho poddtolo. Konnakui online paymentanchi problem yetat kai aaje kal? Hem mhanje dar transactionak kain tori takrar asta.
